original_text: Joshua set up the twelve stones that had been in the middle of the Jordan at the spot where the priests who carried the ark of the covenant had stood. And they are there to this day.
korean_text: 여호수아가 또 요단 가운데 곧 언약궤를 멘 제사장들의 발이 선 곳에 돌 열둘을 세웠더니 오늘까지 거기에 있더라

sentences.original_text: Joshua set up the twelve stones
that had been in the middle of the Jordan
at the spot where the priests
who carried the ark of the covenant had stood
And they are there to this day
